cdist-type__apt_update_index(7)
===============================

NAME
----
cdist-type__apt_update_index - Update apt's package index


DESCRIPTION
-----------
This cdist type runs apt-get update whenever any apt sources have changed.


REQUIRED PARAMETERS
-------------------
None.

OPTIONAL PARAMETERS
-------------------
None.


EXAMPLES
--------

.. code-block:: sh

    __apt_update_index
